languages.text: "Убедил. Мы отыщем путь к Фтону IV и разберемся, что там творится".
"You have convinced me. We shall make our way to Phton IV and deal with whatever is happening there."
languages.original_text: "Убедил. Мы отыщем путь к Фтону IV и разберемся, что там творится".

traits.locale_text: "You have convinced me. We shall make our way to Phton IV and deal with whatever is happening there."
"You have convinced me. We shall make our way to Phton IV and deal with whatever is happening there."
"You have convinced me. We shall make our way to Phton IV and deal with whatever is happening there."
"You have convinced me. We shall make our way to Phton IV and deal with whatever is happening there."

languages.text: “算你说得有道理。我们这就去菲顿四号星，解决那边的问题。”
languages.original_text: "You have convinced me. We shall make our way to Phton IV and deal with whatever is happening there."

traits.locale_text: “算你说得有道理。我们这就去菲顿四号星，解决那边的问题。”

languages.text: «Me ha convencido. Partiremos hacia Phton IV y solucionaremos lo que ocurra allí».
languages.original_text: "You have convinced me. We shall make our way to Phton IV and deal with whatever is happening there."

traits.locale_text: «Me ha convencido. Partiremos hacia Phton IV y solucionaremos lo que ocurra allí».

languages.text: 「お前には納得させられたよ。プトン・IVへ向かい、そこで起きていることが何であれ、対処するとしよう」
languages.original_text: "You have convinced me. We shall make our way to Phton IV and deal with whatever is happening there."

traits.locale_text: 「お前には納得させられたよ。プトン・IVへ向かい、そこで起きていることが何であれ、対処するとしよう」

languages.text: « Vous m'avez {mf|convaincu|convaincue}. Nous nous rendrons sur Phton-IV afin de régler le problème. »
languages.original_text: "You have convinced me. We shall make our way to Phton IV and deal with whatever is happening there."

traits.locale_text: « Vous m'avez {mf|convaincu|convaincue}. Nous nous rendrons sur Phton-IV afin de régler le problème. »

languages.text: "Ihr habt mich überzeugt. Wir reisen nach Phton IV und kümmern uns um die dortigen Geschehnisse."
languages.original_text: "You have convinced me. We shall make our way to Phton IV and deal with whatever is happening there."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt mich überzeugt. Wir reisen nach Phton IV und kümmern uns um die dortigen Geschehnisse."

languages.text: "Beni ikna ettin. Phton IV'e gidecek ve orada her ne oluyorsa ilgileneceğiz."
languages.original_text: "You have convinced me. We shall make our way to Phton IV and deal with whatever is happening there."

traits.locale_text: "Beni ikna ettin. Phton IV'e gidecek ve orada her ne oluyorsa ilgileneceğiz."
